description: A composite beam with AME Properties
title: AMECompositeBeam

CenterLine.description: The center line of the Beam at the cell elevation

TopOfSteelSlopeLine.description: The top of steel line of the Beam

EndReactions_k.description: The end reactions of the element in kips for each load type (service level)

LinearLoads.description: These are the unfactored linear loads applied to the beam (plf)

ReferenceDesignGroupGuid.description: This is the GUID of the beam design group

ReferenceCellComplex.description: This is the GUID of the Cell complex this beam resides in

ReferenceCells.description: This is the GUID of the Cell(s) this beam resides in

TribArea_poly.description: Tributary area polygon(s) of the beam

BeamLiveLoadReductionFactor.description: The reduction factor for live loads based on slope and trib area of the beam

Category.description: A helper property to help categorize which group the beam should be in.  For example, mezzanine, roof, etc...

CellComplexParentId.description: The GUID of the parent Cell complex from which this joist was created

ShearStuds.description: Information about the shear studs attached to this beam

NumberOfStuds.description: Total Quantity of studs on the beam

StudSpacing_in.description: Spacing of the shear studs on the beam, in
